lender.name: Simone
lender.loan_because: God provides for me so I try to provide for others.
lender.occupational_info: I produce special events for charities that benefit abused women and children.

lender.name: melliecarma aka matthias
lender.occupation: warehouseman by day, social investor by night...
lender.loan_because:
i want to make a difference, wanna see the money go to real people, real (smiling =;-)) faces. it's a way for me to bridge cultures, lifestyles + religion. . . .
i committed myself to granting at least one microloan a month through kiva. this commitment was made on the 4th of july, 2009, upon granting my first microloan to amanullah maqsood in afghanistan.
lender.occupational_info:
unloading containers, trucks + trailers the whole day. it pays the cost of living but otherwise it's a pretty senseless thing to do... so i need something to balance it out which brings me here...
drowning islands like the carterets, earthquakes like in haiti and mudslides like on madeira or in the cuzco region (aguas calientes) in peru raise the question for me: what am i doing here? where's the sense in that? what can i do to make the world a better place? part of the answer lies here...
in response to "the case of the faceless lender" i changed my avatar from cool rabbid to the actual one... it's from december 2006, but then i haven't changed that much... i also added my first name (matthias) just in case "my" borrowers might be curious... =8-) you all are great people in my book! knowing that you exist makes my life worth living...! keep on fulfilling your dreams!

lender.name: Mr. Biss
lender.loan_because: I'm eager to connect students to the world of microloans and individual entrepreneurs in developing countries. Kiva can create that interface and experience...
lender.occupational_info: By introducing students to incredible people on the other side of the planet, I hope to open opportunities for entrepreneurs and for the students themselves.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and I want to share that with others.
lender.occupational_info: I learn about and fly airplanes.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I love opportunity and would like to offer it to other people.
lender.occupational_info: I organize film productions for movies, and advertising

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Education, nonprofit management consulting

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: No one I know needs any more stuff! Kiva gift certificates are a better gift than anything I could possibly buy in a store!
lender.occupational_info: I am helping people discover what is special about the way they lead, teach, work, & LIVE. My goal is to empower people and drive conversation that inspires them to help themselves AND OTHERS be as happy & successful as humanly possible!

lender.name: Charles & Sally
lender.loan_because: we want to help others to help themselves

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I Love people
lender.occupational_info: City of Cochran Water Dept.

lender.name: Alberto
lender.loan_because: God blesses who lend to those who cannot pay you back
lender.occupational_info: rewarding

lender.name: Madeleine
lender.occupation: Teacher of English as a Second Language
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who need financial help to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants to the US. I work with a group of people who volunteer to teach -- we don't get paid. Our students come to my city from all over the world.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I have so much love to give. The world needs love.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 5'8", muscular, smart, handsome, blue-green-grey eyes (they change). I speak english, french, spanish and some korean. I like music, art, walks on the beach and getting blitzed.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: As a returned Peace Corp Volunteer; I enjoy giving back to others who need a helping hand locally as well as globally.
lender.occupational_info: I dream

lender.name: Zelin
lender.loan_because: I can. I am awed by the brave and hard working people that borrow to make a better life for themselves and their families. Life has not dealt them a good hand, yet they perceiver. They teach me to hang on and not sweat the small stuff.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank as a tech analyst who is responsible for the IT side of the bank. My role is to help different sectors of the bank with their IT related projects.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps

lender.name: Skullcrusher
lender.occupational_info: I END LIVES

lender.name: Tami
lender.loan_because: I love :)
lender.occupational_info: I am a Social Work student and my favorite things are being around the people and animals that I love, and helping others.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I empower third grade students by providing them with the skills necessary to effect change in our world.

lender.name: Zach
lender.occupational_info: I am a church worship leader, artist, and musician. I have a beautiful wife who also is a part of my band. Together we take delight in helping other people worship using music and art. We also have a passion for furthering the cause of justice in the world.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it makes sense to help people help themselves. I like the idea of empowering people. And I really appreciate how Kiva makes this happen. It's incremental and easy to do.

lender.name: Anderson
lender.loan_because: I wont help peopel do thing's with their lives
lender.occupational_info: clening house

lender.name: Dani
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone in the world in some small way.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: My bit of money can do more good for individuals than the banks.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a graphic software company in customer support, administration, and many other tasks.

lender.name: vijay
lender.loan_because: wanna money
lender.occupational_info: i m working very good

lender.name: Axel
lender.loan_because: Children are in desperate needs. Sponsor a child and help them grow in a positive enviroment. WOuld you donate today owr needs are great. They are cought in the middle. Would you help in donating to help a child today. With only 175.00 per day we can help a family in today's economy.
lender.occupational_info: Everyone who has ever achieved in this world has done so with a combination of luck, timing and help from others in addition to their own abilities.

lender.name: Scout
lender.loan_because: it is best to live with open hands than clenched fists.

lender.name: Chile BBB 09
lender.loan_because: We're Team Chile from the Country in A Bag Activity and we want to be a part of this BIG idea from the BBB course at Erindale! In our 2nd week of the BBB course we formed a "Partnership" and raised $25 between the two of us. Mr. BI$$ converted our hard currency (Canadian cash) into a kind of "soft" currency he called "Kiva Currency". This was a kind of electronic certificate that enabled us to actually invest in our chosen entrepreneur that decided on after much reflection.
lender.occupational_info: We're going onto University and we created a special fund to help do microloans through Kiva, during our class. After the course is over we can continue to monitor our particular entrepreneur's repayment success. We can then reinvest our funds in the months and years ahead or ask for our investment back. We can even change our team name to our individual name(s) as we become working professionals and continue to invest under the BIG Idea banner - and watch other students learn as we did!

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: As an Entrepreneur myself, I recognize the power of the human mind to innovate and fill a niche of need, while improving the quality of our lives.
lender.occupational_info: Supply internet access to remote and rural areas

lender.name: Noriko
lender.loan_because: I believe the "person to person" microfinance is innovative and inspiring! It enhances participation by socially aware individuals.
lender.occupational_info: Our NPO, Social Innovation Japan, is a non-profit organization founded in August, 2005 to promote ‚ÄúSocial Innovation‚Äù (solving social problems by developing innovative social products & services and/or business processes to generate them) and cultivate ‚ÄúSocial Entrepreneurs‚Äù while providing them with the open platform to expand their network. Please visit our website http://www.socialinnovationjapan.org/c000011/

lender.name: Lem Usita
lender.loan_because: I can. I loan because I want to set an example and teach it.
lender.occupational_info: I teach. I write. I lead. I learn. I administrate. I sign things.

lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I make the internet work.

lender.occupational_info: Domain coupons is your one stop resource for the best discounts, deals and coupon code offers from the largest and most popular ICANN accredited registrars like

lender.name: Mary L
lender.loan_because: I love to help others and the best way to live is to give to others.
lender.occupational_info: To help others save money by klipping coupons for them.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves. Little loans can make a big difference
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher who does peace work in my local community. I give assemblies in local schools and attend peace events. I give out World Peace Flame candles and distribute peace literature.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I try to put back into the wider community and this is an excellent way to achieve part of it.

lender.name: Charmaine
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."
lender.occupational_info: I love creating businesses for people involved in areas related to sports, leisure, fitness, healthy food and online marketing of course!

lender.name: Oriseyem
lender.loan_because: i have the ability and will to help others who need and want help.

lender.name: Mr. Ford
lender.loan_because: of the satisfaction of making a difference in someone's personal and business life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach student ages 13 to 20 about many concepts related to business.

lender.name: Mini
lender.occupational_info: I would like to start up a small catering or take-away business in Southern Spain, offering Indian, Creole and European specialties

lender.name: Allyson
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life.

lender.name: JPinVA
lender.loan_because: I have a lot in common with the people who receive Kiva loans, so I understand how important Kiva's work is.
lender.occupational_info: We operate a small coffee roastery in rural Virginia. We buy green coffee beans imported from the equatorial countries around the world. We roast them and sell them to coffee shops and to individuals via our website. Our business is very much like the sorts of businesses that Kiva provides with loans.

lender.name: KCTC
lender.loan_because: We are a group of staff people and adults with developmental disabilities . Our lives have been changed by others. We want to make a change in someone elses life.
lender.occupational_info: K.C.T.C. operates a non-profit business whose mission is to provide adults with developmental disabilities the opportunity to acquire skills necessary to become more productive, contributing members of their community.

lender.name: Gregg
lender.loan_because: Because I made a promise that if I ever made a decent living I would share my wealth with less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I sell fun! Amusement Park Business.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of honest capitalism.
lender.occupational_info: l am an Architect and Designer focused on designing buildings that use little or no energy from fossil fuels. I also consult and train other professionals to learn how to build green and energy efficient buildings.

lender.name: abiola
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Health care

lender.name: Shakespeare
lender.occupation: Starting my own business in the food industry
lender.loan_because: It has been 4 years in the making and I need some funding to finish. I started my own business called Hummilicious. We make hummus, cheesecakes and crackers. We are set to launch in almost 25 stores to start, but need additional funding other than my own pocket.
lender.occupational_info: I am a employed full time as I try to finance my business that I have started, I am hard working, honest and enjoy meeting new people. The start of this business has been exciting for me. Although there is a lot of hard work involved I have met a lot of new people that I would not have met otherwise. When I get to share my business with other's they can feel the excitement and energy as well. I have a staff set up in place worldwide due to meeting people these people at different places. Maybe you are the next person to become part of our growing to team. A small donation/ on lending hand is all that is needed to be considered part of our team. Please help my dream become a reality. Lend a hand today!

lender.name: laon
lender.loan_because: no deposit casinos, casino games, money, win
lender.occupational_info: Kome on and try the best thing you have ever seen! Yes it's all about having fun and win of course!

lender.name: Steve Tkalcevich
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Ray Latiolais
lender.loan_because: If we can make the world a better place to live, then the world will be a better place to live.

lender.name: Life Extension
lender.occupational_info: Life Extension Drugs offers an extensive collection of anti aging drugs. We work with specialists around the world to ensure that you get access towards the most advanced anti-aging medicines available in the market. Find more details about Anti Aging drugs online at http://www.Life-Extension-Drugs.com

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I want to give back and help others out who need it. Been there myself!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a musician. 'Nuff said.

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves is a noble goal.
lender.occupational_info: Use education, research, and mediation services to help people overcome destructive conflict and learn from their mistakes.

lender.name: Kevin and Stacey
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: Folks who helped me always said, "Pass it on." And so that's my mantra.

lender.name: Briana & Peter
lender.loan_because: Briana travels/works in places where she sees need and we want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Briana is a prehistoric archaeologist who works in a museum and on excavations (mostly in East Africa), and Peter teaches anatomy and histology at a veterinary school.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to help and HOPE that the help will be returned when needed.
lender.occupational_info: Currently unemployeed but looking everyday.

lender.name: Emilia
lender.loan_because: my godfather Martin has made me one of the youngest kiva lender. He wants to save up money for me, while other poor people can benefit at the same time.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I can. Kiva is the perfect way to financially give little but individually and globally give a LOT. As someone privileged enough to be continuing my education and yet with huge loans to pay back, Kiva is the best way for me to keep giving and changing others' lives while also improving my own.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate and I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I do engineering and analysis for an electric utility.

lender.name: Edgar
lender.loan_because: Trying to make world a better place. It's just a sentence but if we all believe in it...

lender.name: Team Bear
lender.loan_because: We want to have an impact when we are involved and there is nothing better than helping others help themselves for lasting impact. Also it is great to be able to see who we are lending to!

lender.name: Pedro Plassen
lender.loan_because: Enterpreneurship can be a drive for Development

lender.name: Bay
lender.loan_because: As a successful business owner in Canada I appreciate the opportunity to support businesses in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: Bay Hammocks hand makes hammocks and shade sails that are sold from our shop near Peggy's Cove, Nova Scotia, Canada and around North America on the internet.

lender.name: Art
lender.loan_because: my wife gave a gift in my name
lender.occupational_info: retired electrician

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupational_info: I help ordinary working people find workplace justice in the US courts.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: As a citizen of the world's most prosperous nation, I believe we have a duty to help others improve their lives, attain self-sufficiency, and prosper.

lender.name: Cen
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm five years old and homeschooled. My work is playing soccer, piano and gymnastics. I like to play with my two sisters and ride my bike. I like to be loud and make a mess.

lender.loan_because: I've got a little extra for hard working people
lender.occupational_info: I was able to retire because we both worked hard and saved our money.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: Together in the fight against poverty Eradicate extreme poverty and hunger Reduce child mortality

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: I develop software that is used to facilitate scientific research.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky and some people aren't.
lender.occupational_info: I try to find the common thread of beauty in math, music and art.

lender.name: Wali
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturing and wholesaling of needle felting craft kits.

lender.name: Giri Fox
lender.loan_because: I am deeply moved by the injustice in our global economic framework, and I can afford to make a difference.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: I support keeping the goverment small, the free markets, and capitalism.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work, I shop...

lender.name: Ralph & Karen
lender.loan_because: We feel it's important to help others; to give back.
lender.occupational_info: RJ - I build scientific research facilities and their support structures. KJ - I'm retired; enjoy being a grandma.

lender.name: Jesus
lender.loan_because: Do nothing from selfishness or empty conceit but with humility of mind. Let each of you regard one another aas more important than yourself, do not merly look out for your own personal interest but also for the interest of others.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have money. Some people need money.
lender.occupational_info: I work in IT for a government agency in Ireland.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who need money to help their families or customers.
lender.occupational_info: I want to be a teacher when I grow up.

lender.name: Stian
lender.loan_because: It helps people help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I monitor computer applications used in modern hospitals

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Our team of doctors, nurses and dietitians conduct clinical research in the area of diabetes. We translate this research in to practice and train physicians internationally on treating people with diabetes in their communities.

lender.name: Sophie & Max
lender.loan_because: I hope that this kind of support gives the entrepreneurs an opportunity to establish better life conditions for them, so that they don't have the need to emigrate to the big cities or to other countries.

lender.name: laurie
lender.loan_because: it's good karma
lender.occupational_info: when I am not working on computer projects I teach English to immigrants here in the US

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people need just a bit of help to be successful. There is a saying that if you give a person a fish, you've feed him for a day. Teach a person to fish and you've fed him for a lifetime. I like helping people learn to fish.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are having a dispute resolve their dispute.

lender.name: Karol
lender.loan_because: microfinance is one of the best instruments for the development of small business in rural countries

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Sniveling P. Whiplash
lender.loan_because: I can remotely control destinies of people in foreign lands.

lender.name: Andre
lender.occupational_info: Changing the Way the City Shines One Window at a Time I specializes in hi-rise and residential window cleaning and provides these services based on fast, efficient service with minimal disruption to the workplace.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: Relatively small amounts of money to me makes a huge difference to the lives of real people living on this planet.

lender.name: Hank
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows me to donate what I can, when I can and to see the results of my loans directly. It's a very personal way to provide support to people who need it.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: A pastor friend has a web page http://www.tenfortheworld.org/ in which he challenges people to live on 90 percent of what they earn and to give the other 10 percent away. As a Christian, I agree with him that God blesses us so that we may be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: How would I describe my work? When people apply for government welfare benefits, I apply the rules and decide if they are eligible for the benefits.

lender.name: Rocklin
lender.loan_because: being able to give was the greatest gift given to us.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: well, why not?
lender.occupational_info: I teach 23 awesome 8-9 year olds.

lender.name: DianaSuco
lender.loan_because: my sister introduced me to Kiva and made a loan on my behalf as a birthday gift to me!
lender.occupational_info: I love making people feel good about themselves :-)

lender.name: MessageWatcher, LLC
lender.loan_because: Our company believes in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: We monitor and archive emails for companies.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: money is not mine to keep. Money makes things possible in this world and so rather than store it, I would like others to be able to use the money that passes through my hands for the good of their family, friends and community.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teenagers.

lender.name: Sistacares
lender.loan_because: I want to help women who are taking the first steps to help themselves.

lender.name: Laila
lender.loan_because: I love people who not only dream, but go about the business of living those dreams. I am thrilled to have discovered this opportunity to help.
lender.occupational_info:
I work with animals, mostly dogs. I cut their hair and see to their good hygiene. As silly as it seems, I even put bows in their hair and paint their toe nails! It is very hard work, but I do love it.
I especially love to groom dogs who are considered 'bad'. It's a wonderful feeling when they allow me to handle them when they won't let anyone else. They are the ones who really need help and that's why they are so special to me.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: it's fun! (and good)
lender.occupational_info: I teach Chinese literature at the University of Alberta, in Canada.

lender.name: Peacocks of Maplewood
lender.occupational_info: I work help produce sports and entertanment events at arenas and theaters

lender.name: Josh & Cerise
lender.occupational_info: Josh makes cameras for satellites

lender.name: Clarice
lender.loan_because: It's great to be able to help others reach their goals.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I care about people.

lender.name: gabriela
lender.loan_because: It`s a good thing to do. Easy and safe. Money is not everything but sometimes you just need it.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people, basically. Each human being is unique, each life is important.

lender.name: Rose
lender.occupational_info: I cook various types of home style

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: rhyme and reason are out of balance
lender.occupational_info: Partner At Learning Education in public places Collaboration Across borders

lender.name: Tiago
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back and helping others. Funding entrepreneurs is key to achieve economic growth, creating jobs and providing people opportunities to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Technology Manager

lender.name: Eli
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good helping people

lender.name: Gracie
lender.occupational_info: Care for my husband, son, mother with Alzheimer's, and pets.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you want to see in the world"
lender.occupational_info: I design tools to help doctors during surgery.

lender.name: Kevin Meadows
lender.loan_because: I understand the frustration with raising capital for a business.
lender.occupational_info: My company: Developers Land for Residential and Commercial Projects, Constructs Homes and Buildings Residential / Commercial, Investment Club, Casino Projects, Market and Sell everything Real Estate.

lender.name: Jo C
lender.loan_because: this is such a fabulous idea - not a band aid solution but a means to help people overcome their poverty. A very well organised system
lender.occupational_info: Secondary School Teacher

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: this is a better way to help people than simple charity

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I live in a country where opportunity is around every corner with just a little hard work. I would hope that each person across the globe would be able to experience that sort of chance to make something for themselves. That spirit of going out on your own and being a success is what makes a person and a people free. I want others to have what I have had a chance to experience.

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: I love the impact such a small action can have.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: this is a loan in honor of my Dad for Father's Day 2009. He is an honorable, kind, supportive, generous, patient, tolerant and loving man who I adore with all my heart!
lender.occupational_info: I help people fulfill their dream of owning a home or selling their home.

lender.name: jacquelyn
lender.occupational_info: I live below the poverty rate myself right now. I am a single mom of an 11 year old, and will graduate with a bsw in may of 2010. I am interested in many social justice issues. Having experienced many injustices related to poverty myself, I hope that I will be in a position to help others at some point. The poverty that I have dealt with is nothing compared to what a lot of other people in the world live with, but I do understand some of the powerlessness and lack of respect that many people experience. I have had countless demeaning and demoralizing experiences with the powers that be, right here in Buffalo New York. It will be great to have a decent job when I graduate, but I want to do something more than just go to work everyday and collect a paycheck. Wish me luck! Maybe someday in the future, I'll be able to help you turn things around for yourself too.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I am no longer loaning because of animal cruelty that is being supported on this site

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I see it as a great way to help people, and make an income that is considered small in my community do great things overseas. As a Christian, I believe in blessing and showing love to others. I also see microloans as a sustainable means of helping those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to design printed materials and to facilitate printing at the small printing company where I work.

lender.name: Ammar
lender.occupation: Master degree of Nursing Services Administration

lender.name: Ma. Leah
lender.loan_because: i want to start again my business which was left hanging due to lack of funds.
lender.occupational_info: i am the administrative assistant of a convention center here in cebu.

lender.name: Alexander & Bettina
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a chance and luck. We have more confidence and respect from people asking for support on the Kiva platform than in the whole western financial system.
lender.occupational_info: International Project Management focused on Sustainable Business Development in Africa, respecting ethnography, ethical qualities and traditions

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: instead of buying more books, dvd's, clothes, shoes, make-up etc etc, which gives me only 5 minutes of happiness at the most, I'd rather loan it to someone who actually needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I have a fun and interesting job which allows me to learn something new every day

lender.name: Andy and Kirsten
lender.occupational_info: I teach at International Schools.

lender.name: Adam
lender.occupational_info: United Kingdom

lender.name: Silke & Rainer
lender.loan_because: We live in a world of abundance nevertheless some people are not on the lucky side of life. Therefore, we want to support them to build up their individual dreams. With Kiva we get to know the people directly.
lender.occupational_info: Scan and realize sustainable project ideas which are always based on people¬¥s culture and tradition and their adaptation to modern life.

lender.name: Szilvia
lender.loan_because: I believe poverty is strongly linked to poor health and that the alleviation of poverty in the world isn't the responsibility of a few people who do huge things, but the responsibility of everyone who can do small things. I also believe in hand ups as opposed to hand outs.

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.loan_because: I want to honour the life of our son Matthew who passed over in Feb 09
lender.occupational_info: I manage a training organisation that provides training to people with a disability.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.occupation: Build Volunteer Manager - Habitat for Humanity

lender.name: Dmitriy
lender.occupational_info: On my work I'm help the small bisiness to grow...

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I would like to honor my Father who passed away in 2008. He was a great gardener, carpenter, and cook who loved children and was always ready to help anyone in need. My loans are made in memory of his loving and generous spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I am a costume designer for the theatre and dance. I hope that, through my work, I'm able to inspire, educate, or just entertain people. I've been fortunate to travel around much of the world and have been humbled by my encounters with all of the amazing people I've met.

lender.name: Cam
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and because of a wondeful gift, I have been introduced to and given the opportunity to share with others through KIVA

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I understand how difficult it is to raise capital even in the best of times.
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals and businesses get mortgages

lender.name: St. Cyprian Church
lender.loan_because: Our Lenten theme is One World, One Community,One Family. In lending witrh Kiva we are assisted in living our theme.
lender.occupational_info: "A Parish united to praise, worship, and spread the word of the Lord, by sharing the gifts that God has given us." (Mission Statement 2005)

lender.name: Hannie
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: moey
lender.loan_because: Tiny acorns become mighty oaks.

lender.name: Roxana
lender.loan_because: I respect those who strive to support themselves and their families and make a decent living, wherever they are.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to give many people a chance to do great things.
lender.occupational_info: I wiork with students (6th and 7th grade) with social and emotional disabilities.

lender.name: Kevin Duff
lender.loan_because: I believe that we have a duty to serve the global good. We are the luckiest of the luckiest and should be obliged to help those less fortunate. We did not earn our life; we were born into it. Unlike us, the majority of the world is destitute, living in absolute poverty, without access to food, proper sanitation or clean drinking water. Our generation needs to put forth a bona fide effort to make change happen, to promote global equity. In years past, civilizations have been chastised for human rights atrocities: slavery, massacre, and imperialism to name but a few. Could our lack of action be just as wicked. Will we be likened to our historical malefactors, not for our evil actions but our blind apathy?
lender.occupational_info: I just finished a masters degree in physiotherapy and will be working locally for a year before travelling abroad to work as a physiotherapist in low income countries. Afterwards, I plan on returning to school to pursue advanced training in Global Health.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I care about other people.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a major university in the midwestern part of the United States. I am in charge of the libraries at this university.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowerment and ownership

lender.name: Boram
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea. If I can help other people with this and they can do what they want, it will be my pleasure.
lender.occupational_info: I'm teaching English and also learning it, so I'm spending almost all day on being with lovely kids.

lender.name: Rick
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn to communicate better - especially speaking to groups.

lender.name: Chiaras Promise
lender.loan_because: we are called to share with others to make a better world.

lender.name: Daniel.in.Canada
lender.loan_because: I have lived and worked in several countries and appreciate the entrepreneurial efforts of those working toward a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired I worked at several universities in the Faculty of Business.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: So many have given to me over the years,, and I feel extreme guilt that I don't give back enough.. I need to PAY IT FORWARD. I love lending through Kiva.org; not only am I giving to help build up businesses and local wealth bases, but I can watch the growth happening, and then give again when I'm repaid.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: Every drop helps!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help improve the lives of people who have never had the opportunities that I have had.
lender.occupational_info: I sell a computer program that helps my clients convert their print files into portable document formats for storing, web presentment and emailing.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: It's a non patrimonial way of helping people out.
lender.occupational_info: Student
